Carrots are high in beta-carotene, which is important for eye health and maintaining healthy skin. They are also a good source of fiber, potassium, and vitamins A, C, and K.

Carrots are a good source of vitamins and minerals, including Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin K, potassium, and manganese. They are also a good source of dietary fiber, which can help promote digestive health.
